overdrive.issue: Rundowns will not load to Overdrive
steps: Close all Overdrive programs (Rundown Control and Direct Control)
Open the overdrive server from the desktop
Press Stop for all 4 options. Wait until all switch to stop and the stop buttons are greyed out.
Press the start button on each service. Best to do one at a time. Wait until all lights are green.
Launch Rundown Control and Direct Control. Make sure all lights are green.
overdrive.notes: Entire process should take less than 10 minutes. Be patient while stopping and starting the services. It may take a minute after you press the start and/or stop button.
